name: Like Minds
description:
Two characters joined together by sharing the same controller. What is their mission?

A simple game for https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2021

Control with Gamepad or WASD + space.

For best performance, download the Windows version

Most stuff made by Mattis Castegren

Music: Dupe Dodging by Speck (c) http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/speck/63463 Ft: Martijn de Boer
